title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated documentation on internal repositories: clarified access permissions for organization members.
Added a link for Rust built-in queries in the code scanning documentation.
Introduced a new content-linter rule (GHD062) to validate `introLinks` keys in frontmatter against `ui.yml`.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated documentation on internal repositories: clarified access permissions for organization members.
- Added a link for Rust built-in queries in the code scanning documentation.
- Introduced a new content-linter rule (GHD062) to validate `introLinks` keys in frontmatter against `ui.yml`.
